price: Allah Yana yin izgili* gare su kuma Yana taimakon su a cikin ɓatarsu, suna ɗimuwa.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَسۡتَهۡزِئُ بِهِمۡ وَيَمُدُّهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
footnotes: * Allah Yanã mayar masu da sakamakon izgilinsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yastahzi-u bihim wayamudduhum fī ṭugh'yānihim yaʿmahūna
